source.author: Heloise Heloise
source.title: Hints From Heloise: What to do with an old mink coat?

exampleSentences.sentence: If that doesn't, I use my emergency flashers and slow down a little.
If we are with Mr. Flasher at a quarter past, we shall just hit the best time.

source.title: The Posthumous Papers of the Pickwick Club, v. 2(of 2)
source.author: Charles Dickens

exampleSentences.sentence: A Flasher,—to swear how often the bank had been stripped by lucky players.

source.title: The Gaming Table:  Its Votaries and Victims
source.author: Andrew Steinmetz

exampleSentences.sentence: Captain Flasher did not give satisfaction, which indeed was not to be expected, considering that he wanted a subscription.
